main event: A light-green object, about 40 feet in diameter, was seen hovering over a ploughed field in Bastrop, Texas on June 10, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed through trees and shot up out of sight very quickly, in about 10 seconds.
The object was moving very fast and silently.
Several personnel at Perrin Air Force Base in Texas observed a bright unidentified object on June 8, 1964, which appeared round and extremely bright, much brighter than the sun.
The object moved with a rapid, level flight path and exhibited no exhaust or trail.
Several attempts were made to photograph the object at Perrin Air Force Base, but the extreme brightness prevented any successful photographs.
sighted object: a light-green object about 40 feet in diameter, and a bright unidentified object that appeared round and extremely bright
location: Bastrop, Texas and Perrin Air Force Base, Texas
witnesses: a witness in Bastrop, Texas and several personnel at Perrin Air Force Base
photographs: no photographs were obtained due to the extreme brightness of the objects
